name: This film is so REAL
reviewBody:
I don't know if some of you are aware of this facts, but Pinki and Svaba are real-life criminals, in fact guy who played Pinki( Dusan Pekic ) was killed shortly after making this film, and I know Milan Maric is also in same thing...

I live about a kilometer from place where this movie was shot, just before this movie was released I heard a story about two teens shooting themselves in the same fashion as it is show in film.

I must mention that when this movie came out in Serbia, things were really like that, I was then 17, in high school, and I can tell you that then were many such stories, this kind of life was common, and that's the significance of TV show, to show that this was reality for many...
